baselChapters.title: Short Title and Commencement
baselChapters.summary: Defines the title of these regulations as the 'Basel III Capital Regulations' and specifies the commencement dates for different categories of UCBs.
baselChapters.notes: Establishes the legal framework and timeline for Basel III implementation in UCBs.

baselChapters.title: Commencement of Applicability
baselChapters.summary: Specifies the phased implementation timeline for Basel III regulations based on UCB tiers (Tier 1, Tier 2, Tier 3/4) with specific dates and requirements.
baselChapters.notes: Critical chapter defining when each tier of UCB must comply with Basel III requirements. Tier 1 UCBs commence from April 1, 2026.

baselChapters.title: Definitions
baselChapters.summary: Provides comprehensive definitions of key terms used in the regulations including capital instruments, risk components, and regulatory terminology.
baselChapters.notes: Contains 25+ key definitions essential for understanding and implementing Basel III.

baselChapters.title: Capital Structure
baselChapters.summary: Defines the structure of regulatory capital including the components of Tier 1 and Tier 2 capital, eligibility criteria, and deductions from capital.
baselChapters.notes: Core chapter defining what qualifies as regulatory capital for UCBs.

baselChapters.title: Capital Adequacy Requirements
baselChapters.summary: Specifies the minimum capital requirements including capital adequacy ratio, Tier 1 ratio, and capital conservation buffer requirements.
baselChapters.notes: Sets the CRAR minimum at 9% for all UCBs with Tier 1 minimum of 6%.

baselChapters.title: Risk-Weighted Assets
baselChapters.summary: Provides the framework for calculating risk-weighted assets for credit, market, and operational risks.

baselChapters.title: Credit Risk - Standardized Approach
baselChapters.summary: Defines the standardized approach for credit risk including risk weights for various asset classes and counterparties.
baselChapters.notes: Provides risk weights for different categories of loans and advances.

baselChapters.title: Securitization Framework
baselChapters.summary: Outlines the regulatory framework for securitization exposures including the standardized approach.
baselChapters.notes: Limited relevance for most UCBs as securitization activities are rare.

baselChapters.title: Counterparty Credit Risk
baselChapters.summary: Addresses counterparty credit risk arising from derivatives, repos, and similar transactions.
baselChapters.notes: Relevant for UCBs engaged in derivatives and securities financing.

baselChapters.title: Market Risk
baselChapters.summary: Specifies the market risk capital requirements for trading book exposures and interest rate risk in the banking book.
baselChapters.notes: Applicable to UCBs with significant trading portfolios.

baselChapters.title: Operational Risk
baselChapters.summary: Defines operational risk capital requirements using the standardized approach based on business indicators.
baselChapters.notes: Applicable to all UCBs based on their business activities.

baselChapters.title: Large Exposures Framework
baselChapters.summary: Limits single borrower and group exposure concentrations to maintain diversification and manage credit concentration risk.
baselChapters.notes: Critical for managing credit concentration in UCB lending.

baselChapters.title: Disclosure Requirements (Pillar 3)
baselChapters.summary: Specifies the disclosure requirements for market discipline including qualitative and quantitative disclosures.
baselChapters.notes: Required for scheduled UCBs and Tier 1 UCBs.

baselChapters.title: Reporting to Reserve Bank
baselChapters.summary: Specifies the reporting requirements including frequency, format, and content of regulatory returns.
baselChapters.notes: Defines periodic reporting obligations to RBI.

baselChapters.title: Penal Provisions
baselChapters.summary: Specifies penalties for non-compliance with the regulations.
baselChapters.notes: Important for understanding consequences of non-compliance.

additionalGuidelines.title: Risk Management Committee Guidelines
additionalGuidelines.summary: Guidelines for constitution and functioning of Risk Management Committee in UCBs including composition, meeting frequency, and responsibilities.

additionalGuidelines.title: Risk Management and Internal Control Guidelines
additionalGuidelines.summary: Comprehensive risk management framework for UCBs including credit, market, and operational risk management systems.

additionalGuidelines.title: Asset Liability Management Guidelines
additionalGuidelines.summary: Framework for managing asset-liability mismatches including interest rate risk and liquidity risk management.

additionalGuidelines.title: Liquidity Management Guidelines
additionalGuidelines.summary: Guidelines for maintaining liquidity including LCR requirements, funding sources, and contingency funding plans.

additionalGuidelines.title: Large Exposures Framework
additionalGuidelines.summary: Framework for limiting large exposures including single and group borrower limits.

additionalGuidelines.title: Cyber Security Framework
additionalGuidelines.summary: Baseline cyber security controls and information security requirements for UCBs.

additionalGuidelines.title: Business Continuity Planning
additionalGuidelines.summary: Guidelines for business continuity planning and disaster recovery.

additionalGuidelines.title: Customer Service Standards
additionalGuidelines.summary: Customer service standards including grievance redressal mechanism and complaint handling.

additionalGuidelines.title: Fit and Proper Criteria
additionalGuidelines.summary: Fit and proper criteria for directors and senior management of UCBs.

additionalGuidelines.title: IT Systems and Controls
additionalGuidelines.summary: IT governance, systems security, and control requirements for UCBs.

additionalGuidelines.title: Risk Management Board Mandate
additionalGuidelines.summary: Mandate and responsibilities of the Risk Management Board/Committee.

additionalGuidelines.title: Supervisory Returns
additionalGuidelines.summary: Format and frequency of supervisory returns to be submitted to RBI.

additionalGuidelines.title: NBFC-UCB Interactions
additionalGuidelines.summary: Guidelines for interactions between UCBs and NBFCs including co-lending arrangements.

appendices.title: Capital Conservation Buffer Requirements
appendices.summary: Details of CCB requirements by bank tier.

appendices.title: Risk Weight Assignments
appendices.summary: Comprehensive risk weight assignments for various asset classes.

appendices.title: Reporting Formats
appendices.summary: Format of returns to be submitted to RBI.
